channel.title: Black Mesa SDK?
channel.description: Will we ever get one? Or do we just use the normal source SDK? Because I want to make/see Black Mesa mods.

item.title: Black Mesa SDK?
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
For the record, we didn’t code any of our own tools. Basic added levels can easily be created using Hammer - the only thing you’re lacking is Black Mesa’s source code, which would be a different consideration.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa SDK?
item.dc:creator: etb513
item.description:
The .fgd files are already present in the BMS directory, so you just load those into the Hammer editor and you’re good to go as far as I know.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa SDK?
item.dc:creator: 1Lister_of_Smeg
item.description:
Black Mesa SDK would be mint, we could even see Opposing Force 2 released ?

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa SDK?
item.dc:creator: jon583
item.description:
I was about to ask this question!

once its finally done with the release of Xen, I can’t think of any reason for them not to. I would love to see someone use it as a base for an opfor, blue shift or decay remake.

Most of all though I’d like to see someone mod the hl2 monsters back in, and make a map where grunts fight combine and gargs battle against striders lol

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa SDK?
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
the devs have been considering possibly maybe eventually potentially releasing one. I hope they do, but there is no official word yet
